project_name: Your Journey - Guest Portal Torre Lapillo

design_philosophy.vibe: Functional, Clean, Welcoming, Premium but Accessible
principles: Mobile-First: All designs must be optimized for iPhone 13/14/15 viewports first.
App-Like Feel: No 'website' scrolling. Use fixed headers/footers and scrollable content areas.
Card-Based UI: Content is chunked into digestible cards with generous padding.
Navigation: Bottom tab bar is the primary navigation method.
Visuals: High-quality imagery with rounded corners, paired with crisp typography.

usage_rules: Use Navy Blue (#0F172A) for all primary text and active states.
Use Sand Yellow (#F59E0B) sparingly for accents, icons, and 'Recommended' badges.
Backgrounds should be Off-White (#F8FAFC) to reduce eye strain.
Cards must be Pure White (#FFFFFF) to pop against the background.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-slate-900/20 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-slate-100 overflow-hidden
cards.interactive: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-slate-100 hover:shadow-md transition-all cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.98]

inputs.base: bg-slate-50 border-transparent focus:border-slate-900 focus:ring-0 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-slate-900 placeholder:text-slate-400 transition-all

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-slate-200 pb-safe pt-2 px-6 flex justify-between items-center z-50 h-20
navigation.tab_item: flex flex-col items-center gap-1 text-xs font-medium transition-colors

layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-slate-50 relative pb-24

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Common ones: Home, Map, Umbrella, Utensils, Info, Phone, Heart, User, ChevronRight, Search, Filter.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
Ensure all touch targets are at least 44x44px.
All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Avoid 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic placeholder text related to Puglia/Torre Lapillo.
Images must have 'object-cover' and rounded corners.
Use 'framer-motion' for subtle page transitions (fade in/slide up).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'framer-motion' and 'lucide-react' if not present.
2. ROUTING: Set up React Router with a layout that includes the BottomNavigation component (visible on all pages except Splash).
3. SPLASH: Create a Splash Screen that redirects to Dashboard after 2s or on click.
4. DASHBOARD: Implement a grid of 'Quick Action' cards (Wifi, Check-in) and a horizontal scroll of 'Discover' items.
5. PAGES: Build out the 8 required internal pages using the 'Card' component pattern.
6. DATA: Create a mock data file 'data.js' to hold the content for beaches, restaurants, etc., so it's easy to connect to a CMS later.
7. ADMIN: Create a simple Admin Login page (email/password) and a basic Admin Dashboard layout (table view of content).
